text: ۞قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ لَنُخۡرِجَنَّكَ يَٰشُعَيۡبُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَكَ مِن قَرۡيَتِنَآ أَوۡ لَتَعُودُنَّ فِي مِلَّتِنَاۚ قَالَ أَوَلَوۡ كُنَّا كَٰرِهِينَ

translation.en: Said the eminent ones who were arrogant among his people, "We will surely evict you, O Shu'ayb, and those who have believed with you from our city, or you must return to our religion." He said, "Even if we were unwilling
translation.id: Pemuka-pemuka yang meyombongkan diri dari kaum Syu'aib berkata, "Wahai Syu'aib! Pasti kami usir engkau bersama orang-orang yang beriman dari negeri kami, kecuali engkau kembali kepada agama kami."Syu'aib berkata. "Apakah (kamu akan mengusir kami), kendatipun kami tidak suka
